sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
Consider the below figure. It is given that KLM and MOP are two triangles where LK is parallel to MO . Also, \(KP : KM = 6 : 11 \). Now, 
itemize{}
\item Prove that \(\Delta KNP \sim \Delta MOP \)
\item Find KN if \(MO = 5 \)
\item If NP is parallel to LM , find ratio of areas of triangles KNP and KLM .
tikzpicture{}
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Considering triangles KNP and MOP , we have
\[
	\angle KPN = \angle MPO
\]
\[
	\angle NKP = \angle OMP 
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write
\[
	\Delta KNP \sim \Delta MOP 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
It is given that
\[
	\frac{KP }{KM } = \frac{6 }{11 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 11 KP = 6 (KP + PM )
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow 5 KP = 6 PM 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{KP }{PM } \frac{6 }{5 }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "$$\text{
As we already proved that $\Delta KNP \sim \Delta MOP $,}$$ 
\[
	\frac{KN }{MO } = \frac{KP }{PM }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{KN }{5 } = \frac{6 }{5 }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow KN = 6.0 
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
It is given that NP is parallel to LM , so
\[
	\angle KNP = \angle KLM 
\]
In triangles KNP and KLM , we got 
\[
	\angle K = \angle K 
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write that
\[
	\Delta KNP \sim \Delta KLM 
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
So, we can write
\[
	\frac{\textrm{area of }\Delta KNP }{\textrm{area of } \Delta KLM } = \frac{KP ^2}{KM ^2}
\]
\[
	= \frac{36 }{121 }
\]
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$\angle KPN = \angle MPO${Vertically opposite angles}, and $\angle NKP = \angle OMP ${alternate interior angles}. "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon further simplification of $\frac{KP }{KM } = \frac{6 }{11 }$, we get $\frac{KP }{PM } \frac{6 }{5 }$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Since, $$\Delta KNP \sim \Delta MOP $, therefore, $\frac{KN }{MO } = \frac{KP }{PM }$, and hence, $KN = 6.0 $.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$\angle KNP = \angle KLM$,{corresponding angles are equal}. "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$\frac{\textrm{area of }\Delta KNP }{\textrm{area of } \Delta KLM } = \frac{KP ^2}{KM ^2}= \frac{36 }{121 }$, as the ratio of the area of similar triangles is equal to the square of the ratio of the corresponding sides.}$$ "}]
